reviewText: Love the Movie but the recording was off on the sound in one section (lasted about 30-45 seconds).  This is a fairly close representation of the book and great as an intro to young children.

This version of A Christmas Carol is an example of why Disney has been able to make so much money in the entertainment industry:  They hire the best, most creative and artistic people.  This animated version can not hold a candle to the Mickey Mouse version.
I  like this version as is it true to the original story and goes well with my A Christmas Carol collection.
true to the original story, but not high grade animation.  Still I liked it and glad to have it added too my A Christmas Carol collection.
